column1: Little Goat Diner////This was a decent place to enjoy an evening meal
column2: but didn't quite meet the expectations I had either. First of all
column3: as some previous reviews have mentioned
column4: I think "diner" is a bit of a misnomer. Although the interior looks like the traditional American diner
column5: the Little Goat is far from being a local greasy spoon. In terms of price and food
column6: they are clearly aiming for a higher quality market. The place is popular- we had a thirty minute wait for a table after arriving (although this was a lot better than the 3 1/2 hours we were quoted down the road).
